review_data.title: Very down market
review_data.content: We all called on a Sunday around lunchtime to discover only one person serving and nearly all the customers seemed to be family or friends. The two of us were welcomed but still felt like intruders Won’t be back

review_data.title: Great Pizza and Caprese Salad
review_data.content: A great little pizza place with very many options besides pizzas as well. Their farmers fries hit the zone and their caprese salad and veg pizza is excellent!

review_data.title: Great value, but there's better pizza
review_data.content: When not ordering the pizza but picking it up on spot, the price of 9.90 for every pizza might be the best in town! The spot doesn't run an authentic pizza oven with woods and the ingredients probably aren't fresh but from conserves. The service...More

review_data.title: Slow delivery but quite tasty
review_data.content: The delivery took almost 1.5 hours, but on the positive side, the pizza was very tasty, warm and because of a special promotion offer also very cheap (12 CHF).

review_data.title: Substantial Delay!
review_data.content: Unfortunately, my order arrived one hour too late, and my pizza had to be re-nuked. Hardly any words of apology coming from the delivery guy. Pity!

review_data.title: Good pizza, fast delivery
review_data.content: Fast service, good pizza - a little expensive but thats something you can't complain in Zurich. We tried margarita pizza. Language was a problem . The call was taken somebody who didn't know English
